Protocols/DrivitUserSettingsEditorInterf.abstract: DrivitUserSettingsEditorInterface is the protocol that enables the edition of the user settings.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC9startT.name: startTrip()
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC9startT.abstract: This method will force a start of a Trip and will start saving location and activity of the user.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC8stopTr.name: stopTrip()
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC8stopTr.abstract: This method will force the SDK to stop a running trip if this exists, if a trip is not running the method will not do anything.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC11runni.name: runningTrip()
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC11runni.abstract: Call this method to get the trip that is running at the moment.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC8delega.name: delegate(_:)
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC8delega.abstract: To setup a delegate to listen to events given by the SDK. This events are for example: Trip did start, Trip did stop

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC14hasFi.name: hasFilesToSinc(TripGUID:)
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC14hasFi.abstract: This method will say if there is any files needed to upload with the metadata of this trip.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC15force.name: forceSyncOfTrip(TripGUID:)
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC15force.abstract: Force the sync of the files that still need to be uploaded to the server, if the trip has no files to be synced this method will not do anything.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC17syncA.name: syncAccelAndTrips(completion:)
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC17syncA.abstract: Force the sync of trips metadata that were edited and need to be uploaded to the server.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC8sendUs.name: sendUser()
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC8sendUs.abstract: Force the sync of user settings that were edited.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC10userE.name: userEditor()
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC10userE.abstract: Method that will get the user settings and a class that will enabble the edition of those settings.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC35handl.name: handleEventsForBackgroundURLSession(withIdentifier:completion:)
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC35handl.abstract: Required method to be added to the appDelegate. This method will inform the SDK when an event happens with the sync of the files.

Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC18appli.name: applicationDidWake(withOptions:)
Classes/Drivit.html#/s:6DrivitAAC18appli.abstract: Required method to be added to the appDelegate. This method will inform the SDK when an event happens in the regions.

Classes/Drivit.html.name: Drivit
Classes/Drivit.html.abstract: Public interface for the client. This will be the main access to the Drivit SDK funcionalities.

Global Variables.html.name: Global Variables
Global Variables.html.abstract: The following global variables are available globally.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
